name: Horn of Winter

text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.

name: Muck Pools
text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavorText: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

text: Discover a spell. It costs (2) less this turn.

name: Rock Bottom

name: Sanguine Depths
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.

name: Sanguine Depths
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.

name: Sanguine Soldier

name: Scalding Geyser
text: Deal 2 damage. Dredge.

name: Schooling
text: Add three 1/1 Piranha Swarmers to your hand.

flavorText: He's a hunter AND a gatherer.

name: Scourge Troll

flavorText: This is where I'd put my Deathrattle - IF I HAD ONE!

name: Serpent Wig
text: Give a minion +1/+2. If you played a Naga while holding this, add a Serpent Wig to your hand.

name: Shadowtouched Kvaldir

name: Shambling Chow

name: Shattershambler

name: Shield Slam

name: Ship's Chirurgeon

name: Shock Hopper
text: Battlecry: Get a random Overload card.
flavorText: Who is shocked about a frog hopping?

name: Shooting Star

name: Sinful Sous Chef

name: Sinstone Totem

name: Sir Finley, Sea Guide

name: Skeletal Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.

name: Slam
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

name: Southsea Deckhand

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavorText: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Spirit Claws
text: Has +2 Attack while you have Spell Damage.
flavorText: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

name: Staff of the Primus

name: Sunfury Champion

name: Suspicious Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.

name: Suspicious Usher
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavorText: "Oh please, let me take your jacket, luggage, and absurdly large shoulder pads."

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavorText: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Synthesize

name: Tar Slick
text: Minions take double damage this turn. Deal 1 damage.

name: Taste of Chaos
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Finale: Discover a Fel spell.

name: The Light! It Burns!

name: Theft Accusation

name: Thornmantle Musician

name: Totemic Evidence

flavorText: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.

name: Town Crier
text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavorText: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Training Session
text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
flavorText: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

name: Trench Surveyor
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Mech, draw it.
flavorText: Liquid cooled.

name: Trinket Tracker
text: Battlecry: Draw a 1-Cost spell.
flavorText: Dashing through the snow On an undead trinket craze Over the hills we go Tracking all the way!

name: Unleash Fel
text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Manathirst (6): With Lifesteal.
flavorText: Why'd you put it on a leash in the first place?

name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.
flavorText: I shouldn't have licked that.

name: Verse Riff
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavorText: Well anyways, here's Worgen Wall.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text: After you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack until your next turn.
flavorText: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text: After you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack until your next turn.
flavorText: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.

name: Victorious Vrykul
text: After this attacks, get a 2/3 Val'kyr that costs (1).
flavorText: Get three of these and you have a Trikul.

name: Void Virtuoso
text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
flavorText: That is one interesting dress code.

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavorText: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavorText: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Whispers of the Deep
text: Silence a friendly minion, then deal damage equal to its Attack randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavorText: And in the darkest of depths, the sailor heard a command from inside his own mind… “You will also buff my original card to 9 Mana.”

name: Witchwood Apple
text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
flavorText: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

name: Wither
text: Choose a minion. Each friendly Undead steals 1 Attack and Health from it.
flavorText: The opponent's minion can't live wither without you.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavorText: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: X-21 Repairbot
text: Deathrattle: Return any Mechs Magnetized to this to your hand.
flavorText: The circle bolt goes in the square hole.

name: Ymirjar Frostbreaker
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each Frost spell in your hand.
flavorText: Also gains +1 Attack for each time your opponent mispronounces his name.

name: Absorbent Parasite
text: Magnetic, Rush Can Magnetize to Mechs and Beasts.
flavorText: Your beasts' iron levels are high, what have you been feeding them?

name: Always a Bigger Jormungar
text: Give a minion +2 Attack and "Excess damage dealt by attacks hits the enemy hero."
flavorText: I saw it! It's big, scary, and blue!

name: Amalgam of the Deep
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a minion of the same minion type.
flavorText: Most explorers call it a success to find just one new species. Imagine Finley's excitement when he identified ten at once!

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (1)
flavorText: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Anchored Totem
text: After you summon a 1-Cost minion, give it +2/+1.
flavorText: The Naga devised the perfect retaliation to any pirates dropping anchor in their domain: vandalism.

name: Anima Extractor
text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: After we are done you're welcome to help yourself to cookies and apple juice. Thank you for your donation!

name: Annoy-o-Tron
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

name: Anonymous Informant
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play costs (0).
flavorText: It turns out she wasn't so great at keeping secrets after all.

name: Aqua Archivist
text: Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: Do not summon! I JUST had to put all my scrolls in rice.

name: Arcane Quiver
text: Discover a spell from your deck. If it's Arcane, give it Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: "Quiver in fear!" - The Lich King "Ok." - Me

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavorText: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Arrow Smith
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean it's a violin bow!?!"

name: Arson Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after your hero takes damage.
flavorText: We didn't start the fire!

name: Astalor Bloodsworn
text: Battlecry: Add Astalor, the Protector to your hand. Manathirst ( ): Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: I hear his third phase is even more intense.

name: Attorney-at-Maw
text: Choose One - Silence a minion; or Give a minion Immune this turn.
flavorText: When the going gets tough, you don't want a criminal lawyer... you want a criminal lawyer...

name: Audio Amplifier
text: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana and hand size to 11.
flavorText: And you thought we were putting Wildheart Guff in Core. We'd never do that! WINK WINK.

name: Audio Medic
text: Rush Finale: Gain Lifesteal.
flavorText: His performance isn't over, watch!

name: Audio Splitter
text: Deathrattle: Copy the highest Cost spell in your hand.
flavorText: "I tried to give him some constructive criticism but gosh, he really hates feedback!"

name: Azsharan Scavenger
text: Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Scavenger' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Some local Murloc populations have adapted to survive in the harsh conditions of the ruins, much to the fascination of Sir Finley.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, give it +3/+3.
flavorText: Oh my god, the bait and switch works every time!

name: Baritone Imp
text: Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health. Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: He used to be an epic sax guy, but now he's just a common.

name: Barrel of Monkeys
text: Summon a 1/4 Monkey with Taunt. (3 Monkeys left!)
flavorText: There used to be four monkeys, but then one fell off and bumped his head.

name: Bash
text: Deal 3 damage. Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice. It doesn't.

name: Battlefield Necromancer
text: At the end of your turn, raise a Corpse as a 1/3 Risen Footman with Taunt.
flavorText: Coming soon: the Hand Necromancer and the Deck Necromancer.

name: Bestial Madness
text: Give +1 Attack to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavorText: "Hey this isn't what we were trying to excavate!"

name: Bibliomite
text: Battlecry: Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
flavorText: He did NOT want to cast a spell.

name: Bladestorm
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
flavorText: Dear minions: Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh. Best regards, Bladestorm

name: Blazing Power
text: Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each damaged friendly character.
flavorText: Apply heat directly to the damaged area.

name: Blood Matriarch Liadrin
text: After you summon a minion with less Attack than this, give it Divine Shield and Rush.
flavorText: All's fair in blood and war.

name: Blood Tap
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Spend 2 Corpses to give them +1/+1 more.
flavorText: Come join us in the tavern! We have whatever you're drinking on tap. Yes, even that.

name: Blood Tap
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Spend 2 Corpses to give them +1/+1 more.
flavorText: Come join us in the tavern! We have whatever you're drinking on tap. Yes, even that.

name: Bloodbound Imp
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavorText: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Bone Flinger
text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 2 damage.
flavorText: It’s the scourge bringing, plague slinging, bone flinging basher!

name: Carving Chisel
text: After your hero attacks, summon a random basic Totem.
flavorText: Look at your stone. Visualize the totem within. Then gently...

name: Castle Kennels
text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack. If it's a Beast, give it Rush.
flavorText: Play dead! Oh…

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavorText: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!" "When do we want it?" "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Chill-o-matic
text: Magnetic Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavorText: After a number of island vacations, he thought the Storm Peaks would be a nice change of pace.

name: Chitinous Plating
text: Gain 4 Armor. At the start of your next turn, gain 4 more.
flavorText: Durable, detachable and dishwasher safe.

name: Chum Bucket
text: Give all Murlocs in your hand +1/+1. Repeat for each Murloc you control.
flavorText: Time to go in for the krill.

name: Class Action Lawyer
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, set a minion's stats to 1/1.
flavorText: "Have you or a loved one ever been injured in a Consecration?"

name: Cold Feet
text: Enemy minions cost (5) more next turn.
flavorText: Looks like some of the dancers still need to warm up.

name: Conductivity
text: The next spell you cast this turn also targets adjacent minions.
flavorText: That faceless sure didn't put up a lot of (length/cross-sectional area).

name: Conjured Arrow
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Manathirst (6): Draw that many cards.
flavorText: We just call them "cursors".

name: Conqueror's Banner
text: Reveal a card from each player's deck, three times. Draw any of yours that cost more.
flavorText: Olgra, I love your new tapestry! Where did you get it?

name: Coroner
text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Manathirst (6): Silence it first.
flavorText: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.

name: Cosmic Keyboard
text: After you cast a spell, summon an Elemental with stats equal to its Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: Mine is signed by Algalon himself.

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavorText: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Crazed Wretch
text: Has +2 Attack and Charge while damaged.
flavorText: Enrage is all the rage.

name: Creation Protocol
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck. Forge: Get another copy.
flavorText: If you want the destruction protocol, just go in reverse.

name: Crescendo
text: Take Fatigue damage. Deal that much damage to all enemies. Take Fatigue damage. Deal that much damage to all enemies.
flavorText: The more you flail your arms, the better the orchestra plays! Yup, that's definitely how it works.

name: Crooked Cook
text: At the end of your turn, if you dealt 3 or more damage to the enemy hero, draw a card.
flavorText: There are many things not called poison which can kill a man. But in this case, it is poison.

name: Crystalline Statue
text: Rush. Starts Dormant. After you draw 4 cards, this awakens.
flavorText: Hey! Who Greened my statue?!

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
flavorText: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Dance Floor
text: Give your minions Rush.
flavorText: I don't think Rush would ever be here.

name: Dark Transformation
text: Transform an Undead into a 4/5 Undead Monstrosity with Rush.
flavorText: The Northrend Arm Wrestling Championship just found its new champion.

name: Dead Air
text: Destroy your Undead. Resummon them.
flavorText: We'll be right back after a word from our specters.

name: Deathchiller
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to two random enemies.
flavorText: Man, death is like the most chill state... you've got nothing to do but relax.

name: Deathweaver Aura
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Zombies." Overload: (1)
flavorText: Knitting is a harmless hobby. Weaving, though...

name: Defile
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
flavorText: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Dirty Rat
text: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavorText: It's not his fault… Someone keeps stealing his soap!

name: Disc Jockey
text: Combo: Add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavorText: Hype coefficient insufficient.

name: Disciple of Golganneth
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random Overload card in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Warning: If you are not made of rocks, do not stand in lightning water.

name: Distressed Kvaldir
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Oh look at that, I have been impaled.

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavorText: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Double Cross
text: Secret: When your opponent spends all their Mana, draw two cards.
flavorText: Valeera revealed herself to be a double agent. At which point Maiev felt comfortable revealing that she also was a double agent. And then Scabbs announced to everybody that - get this - he was a double agent.

name: Down with the Ship
text: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: It has been a privilege playing with you tonight.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to a minion.
flavorText: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Dreamboat
text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health to all other friendly minions. Gain +1/+1 for each one Overhealed.
flavorText: As the only member that can sing underwater, Paz saved Poison Bloom's Zin-Azshari tour from failure.

name: Embers of Strength
text: Summon two 1/2 Guards with Taunt. Manathirst (6): Give them +1/+2.
flavorText: Remember, remember, the 1/2's of Ember.

name: Embrace of Nature
text: Draw a Choose One card. Forge: It has both effects combined.
flavorText: BY OUR POWERS COMBINED…

name: Emergency Maneuvers
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a copy of it. It's Dormant for 1 turn.
flavorText: DO A BARREL ROLL!

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavorText: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavorText: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Eye of Shadow
text: Your hero has Lifesteal.
flavorText: It's hard to makeup flavor text sometimes.

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Elusive
flavorText: Adorable. Immune to Magic. Doesn't pee on the rug. The perfect pet!

name: False Disciple
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Priest minion from the past.
flavorText: "...and they were roommates..." "oh my god"

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavorText: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Fanboy
text: Choose One - Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Rush; or +2 Health and Lifesteal.
flavorText: His name? Stan.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavorText: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Flame Revenant
text: After you summon an Elemental, give it +1/+1.
flavorText: 4x weak to water.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore 4 Health. Draw a card.
flavorText: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Fogsail Freebooter
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal 2 damage.
flavorText: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.

name: For Quel'Thalas!
text: Give a friendly minion +3 Attack. Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: For kwell-kell.. for kell… for kwee- for the city!

name: Forged in Flame
text: Destroy your weapon, then draw cards equal to its Attack.
flavorText: Don't worry, your wounds are self-cauterizing!

name: Fossil Fanatic
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Fel spell.
flavorText: Praise Lord Helix!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavorText: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Frenzied Fangs
text: Summon two 2/1 Bats. Infuse ( ): Give them +1/+2.
flavorText: That's one stylish bat.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavorText: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: From the Scrapheap
text: Get three 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbots with random bonus effects.
flavorText: Well that's a load of scrap.

name: Frost Strike
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, Discover a Frost Rune card.
flavorText: Anyone up for some frost bowling?

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavorText: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frozen Over
text: Both players draw 2 cards. Your opponent can not play them next turn.
flavorText: We will find out who wins when we return in the spring.

name: Frozen Touch
text: Deal 3 damage. Infuse ( ): Add a Frozen Touch to your hand.
flavorText: Is this what Bob was talking about when he said he served a drink to a Death Knight once?

name: Furious Furnace
text: Magnetic Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: He is absolutely fuming.

name: Ghoulish Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Your next Concoction costs (0).
flavorText: AND I THREW IT ON THE GROUND!

name: Gifts of Azshara
text: Draw a card. If you played a Naga while holding this, do it again.
flavorText: Barber: What do you want? Naga: You ever have a thirst for arcane power? Barber: Say no more.

name: Great Hall
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: It's fabulous! It's grand! It's, well it's really very nice.

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Groovy Cat
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gives your hero 1 more Attack this game.
flavorText: "Like, what if we're all just cards living in this box called Hearthstone, man?"

name: Guard the City
text: Gain 3 Armor. Summon a 2/3 Naga with Taunt.
flavorText: At thousands of feet below the surface, it's a pretty high-pressure job.

name: Hand of A'dal
text: Give a minion +2/+1. Draw a card.
flavorText: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Harbinger of Winter
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Frost spell.
flavorText: Winter: it be comin'.

name: Harmonic Hip Hop
text: Deal 1 damage. Give your weapon +3 Attack. (Swaps each turn.)
flavorText: I can name four things that rhyme with 'orange': Four inch, Door hinge, Syringe, and uh… Shmorange.

name: Harmonic Mood
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor. (Swaps each turn.)
flavorText: ROYGBive your hero +2 Attack this turn.

name: Hematurge
text: Battlecry: Spend a Corpse to Discover a Blood Rune card.
flavorText: She's here to PUMP! YOU UP!

name: Hematurge
text: Battlecry: Spend a Corpse to Discover a Blood Rune card.
flavorText: She's here to PUMP! YOU UP!

name: Hidden Meaning
text: Secret: When your opponent ends their turn with no Mana, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavorText: I'm telling you, if you play the song backwards at triple speed I SWEAR Mukla sings about the Burning Legion.

name: Hipster
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from your opponent's class that isn't in their deck.
flavorText: Oh, so you like Hearthstone? Name every spell.

name: Ice Trap
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
flavorText: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Immolation Aura
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions twice.
flavorText: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

name: Imp-oster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.
flavorText: There is an imposter among us.

name: Impending Catastrophe
text: Draw a card. Repeat for each Imp you control.
flavorText: The imps end you, and the cats... well, they astrophe.

name: Incorporeal Corporal
text: After this minion attacks, destroy it.
flavorText: You won't believe how long this was called "Incorporal Corporeal"…

name: Infected Peasant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Peasant.
flavorText: The peasants are revolting!

name: Infinitize the Maxitude
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (1). Finale: Return this to your hand at end of turn.
flavorText: When your music is instrumental, it doesn't matter if the words make no sense.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Me-OW!

name: Inkveil Ambusher
text: Stealth Has +3 Attack and Immune while attacking.
flavorText: You’ve got it wrong. She releases ink when you’re scared.

name: Instrument Tech
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavorText: A tech card without Tradeable? CRINGE.

name: Invent-o-matic
text: Whenever you Magnetize a minion, give it +1/+1.
flavorText: The inventor was really proud, until they realized inventing something that invents things makes for poor job security.

name: Inventor's Aura
text: Your Mechs cost (1) less. Lasts turns.
flavorText: Ok, fine, I'll read the manual…

name: Jackpot!
text: Add two random spells from other classes that cost (5) or more to your hand.
flavorText: Find someone who looks at you the way Hooktusk looks at loot.

name: Jam Session
text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Deal 1 damage to all other minions. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Their skills will make you jelly.

name: Jukebox Totem
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
flavorText: If you really love Hearthstone, put another coin in the Totem baby!

name: K9-0tron
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a 1-Cost minion, summon it.
flavorText: You merely adopted the Battlegrounds. I was born in it. Molded by it.

name: Kaja'mite Creation
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class that costs (3) or less.
flavorText: You made this? I made this.

name: Kidnap
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, stuff it in a 0/4 Sack.
flavorText: Check your coat, but don't check the coat closet.

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Kotori Lightblade
text: After you cast a Holy spell on this, cast it again on another friendly minion.
flavorText: You need healing.

name: Lifebinder's Gift
text: Choose One - Get 2 random Nature spells; or Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Everyone's investing in Nature spells these days, but that bubble is about to burst.

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: Always roll need.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavorText: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Magister's Apprentice
text: Your Arcane spells cost (1) less.
flavorText: "If this is the work I'll be doing, maybe I don't want to be just like you someday..."

name: Mana Geode
text: Overheal: Summon a 2/2 Crystal.
flavorText: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

name: Mark of Scorn
text: Draw a card. If it's not a minion, deal 4 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: Threat Level who? Mark of Scorn!

name: Mark of the Wild
text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3. (+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavorText: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Maze Guide
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavorText: "And if you look to your left, you'll see an even larger statue of Sire Denathrius!"

name: Menacing Nimbus
text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
flavorText: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

name: Mind Eater
text: Deathrattle: Add a copy of a card in your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavorText: Watch out brain, she'll chew you up! She's a Mind Eater!

name: Mosh Pit
text: Spend 3 Corpses to give a friendly minion Reborn.
flavorText: Let the Corpses hit the floor!

name: Motion Denied
text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT 200 GOLD.

name: Multi-Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. They may attack an additional enemy minion.
