name: Soulburner Varia
text: After a friendly Undead dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero and get a random Shadow Priest spell.
flavorText: Captain's Log. 8/11/2023 There are 60 minutes remaining until the Flavor Text is due. It is Friday at 4 PM. We are out of stamina and ideas. Please send funnies, punnies, quippies, or your finest hahas. - The Design Team

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavorText: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

name: Spectral Trainee
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: After graduating at the top of her class from Scholomance, she was granted an eternal scholarship to study abroad in Naxxramas.

name: Stag Charge
text: Deal 3 damage. Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
flavorText: Stag! You’re it!

name: Stargazer Luna
text: After you play the right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavorText: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

name: Starlight Groove
text: Give your hero Divine Shield. For the rest of the game, playing a Holy spell refreshes it.
flavorText: In space, no one can hear you groove.

name: Starlight Whelp
text: Battlecry: Get a random card from your starting hand.
flavorText: Starlight, star bright, first whelp I see tonight.

name: Static Waveform
text: At the start of EACH turn, lose 1 Attack or Health (chosen randomly).
flavorText: LET ME SEE YOU MAKE SOME NOISE!!!

name: Steam Guardian
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. Reduce the Cost of a Fire spell in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Its boiling steam and erupting magma serve as a pretty good form of 2-Factor Authentication.

name: Stewart the Steward
text: Deathrattle: Give the next Silver Hand Recruit you summon +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavorText: How many bites does it take to get the center of an hors d'oeuvre?

name: Stitched Creation
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2. Infuse ( ): Gain +3/+3. Manathirst ( ): Gain +4/+4.
flavorText: To defend Naxxramas from the oncoming adventurers, the Scourge created a monstrosity the world had never seen before: an abomination wearing clothes!!

name: Stonehill Defender
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavorText: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

name: Student of the Stars
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanent +3/+3.
flavorText: She is getting her major in Ursa.

name: Suffocating Shadows
text: When you play or discard this, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "Reading is good for you," they said.

name: Sunfury Clergy
text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health to all friendly characters. Manathirst (6): Restore 6 Health instead.
flavorText: Why is the sun so mad? Won't anyone ask about its feelings?

name: Suspicious Pirate
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavorText: EVERY party should be a costume party.

name: Swipe
text: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
flavorText: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe! ... or hug.

name: Swordfish
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Pirate, give this weapon and the Pirate +2 Attack.
flavorText: While you were partying, I studied the fish.

name: Tar Creeper
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavorText: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

name: Tentacle Tender
text: At the end of your turn, get a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.
flavorText: It's a messy job but somebody's got to do it. Well, actually, nobody should do this.

name: The Harvester of Envy
text: After you play a card copied from the opponent, steal the original.
flavorText: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

name: The Stars Align
text: Transform minions in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavorText: Sweet, three Desert Obelisks!

name: Thorim, Stormlord
text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals. Draw that many cards.
flavorText: In the mountains.

name: Tight-Lipped Witness
text: Secrets can't be revealed.
flavorText: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

name: Timewarden
text: Battlecry: Until the end of your next turn, Dragons you summon gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: When are we getting the Silver, Gold, and Diamond dragonflight?

name: Tough Crowd
text: Outcast: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavorText: "Your music's bad and you should feel bad."

name: Treasure Guard
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: The real treasure was the Naga we met along the way.

name: Trogg Exile
text: Rush Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Trogg used to rule…

name: Turn the Tides
text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavorText: T I D E S

name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.

name: Unliving Champion
text: Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon two 3/2 Zombies.
flavorText: Unlive a little!

name: Vengeful Visage
text: Secret: After an enemy minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it to attack the enemy hero.
flavorText: The mirror shows us nothing less than the deepest, darkest desire of our hearts: to go face.

name: Vile Apothecary
text: At the end of your turn, add a random Concoction to your hand.
flavorText: When he's feeling extra malicious, he uses the licorice-flavored one.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavorText: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Walking Dead
text: Taunt If you discard this minion, summon it.
flavorText: Watch out for the Scourge, KAAARRRRLLLL!

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +2 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: He doesn't even get Sundays off. Every day he's hostling.

name: Weapons Expert
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, give it +1/+1. Otherwise, draw a weapon.
flavorText: "Yes, Your Honor, this appears to be some sort of blade."

name: Weight of the World
text: Draw 2 cards. Forge: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent first.
flavorText: Unluckily for him, Azeroth has a tendency to get bigger every 2 years or so.

name: Whirlweaver
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell last turn, Discover an Elemental.
flavorText: Of all the creations from the Construct Quarter, a naga combined with water is the most intuitive.

name: Wild Spirits
text: Summon two different Dormant Wildseeds. Make your Wildseeds awaken 1 turn sooner.
flavorText: Wait, this card just released! It should be Standard Spirits!

name: Worgen Roadie
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/3 Instrument Case for your opponent. (Break it for a random weapon!)
flavorText: "I asked for an instrument, and you give me a CURSED BLADE!?"

name: Zola the Gorgon
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

name: Alarmed Securitybot
text: Deathrattle: Draw another minion. Set its Attack, Health, and Cost to 5.
flavorText: THREAT LEVEL: 5! Which doesn't actually sound that bad to be honest.

name: Algalon the Observer
text: Battlecry: Replace your Hero Power with Algalon's Vision.
flavorText: That's so Algalon, it’s the future he can see.

name: Ambassador Faelin
text: Battlecry: Put 3 Colossal minions on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: For thousands of years, Faelin has longed to return to his homeland. Will Zin-Azshari be as he hopes, or are the secrets of the deep better left forgotten?

name: Ambient Lightspawn
text: Finale and Overheal: Give another random friendly minion +2/+2.
flavorText: Make sure it's smaller than your other lightspawns for the best fill lighting.

name: Angry Helhound
text: Rush Has +4 Attack on your turn.
flavorText: When you wake up on the all 3 wrong sides of the bed.

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavorText: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Astral Serpent
text: At the end of your turn, if this didn't attack, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Call it lazy all you want, but it does have two more cards than you.

name: Azsharan Defector
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Defector' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: "I've got a sinking feeling about this evil Queen."

name: Azsharan Ritual
text: Silence a minion and summon a copy of it. Put a 'Sunken Ritual' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: The harmonious silence surrounding the ritual was unceremoniously BROKEN when HAROLD began eating stale potato chips.

name: Azsharan Saber
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Saber' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Even in ancient times, the Night Elves were committed cat people.

name: Baba Naga
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, deal 3 damage.
flavorText: A folktale told to Naga children to scare them from swimming too close to the surface.

name: Backstage Bouncer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a copy of this.
flavorText: Doesn't see your name on the list. Also doesn't know how to read the names on the list.

name: Baroness Vashj
text: If this would transform into a minion, summon that minion instead.
flavorText: Vashj was supposed to make an appearance in "The Sunken City," but after a freak accident in "Ashes of Outland," she ended up here.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Bioluminescence
text: Give your minions Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: The perfect card for Spell Damage Shaman and Spelling Bee Shaman.

name: Blademaster Okani
text: Battlecry: Secretly choose to Counter the next minion or spell your opponent plays while this is alive.
flavorText: Yet ANOTHER sword fighter that spams counters.

name: Bonecaller
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Undead that died this game.
flavorText: Hello, am I speaking to the undead of the household? We have been trying to reach you about your skeleton's extended warranty.

name: Boogie Down
text: Summon two 1-Cost minions from your deck. Finale: Summon another.
flavorText: Whatever you do, do NOT sashay to the right.

name: Boon of the Ascended
text: Give a minion +2 Health. Summon a Kyrian with its stats and Taunt.
flavorText: Ascension is not some external power granted to you, it is the power you find within yourself.

name: Brass Elemental
text: Rush, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavorText: You handle the water spells. It's got the earth, wind, and fire covered.

name: Bubblebot
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavorText: Bubblebot, bubble bubble bubblebot.

name: Buffet Biggun
text: Battlecry: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Infuse ( ): Give them +2 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Look, I just want to know what kind of monster put raisins in this."

name: Burden of Pride
text: Summon three 1/3 Jailers with Taunt. If you have 20 or less Health, give them +1/+1.
flavorText: A group of burdens is called a pride.

name: Candleraiser
text: Divine Shield Finale: Give adjacent minions Divine Shield.
flavorText: You would not believe your eyes If ten million kobold guys Lit up the world to this ogre beat

name: Cannibalize
text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: The Silvermoon health inspector has some choice words for the Lich King.

name: Champion of Storms
text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Elemental. Forge: With Rush.
flavorText: Has some grievances it just can't wait to air out.

name: Chatty Bartender
text: At the end of your turn, if you control a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: "So a Venthyr, an Old God, and a Tauren walk into a bar…"

name: Coilfang Constrictor
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand and choose one. It can't be played next turn.
flavorText: How do you know when someone has a crush on you? They take your breath away.

name: Cold Case
text: Summon two 2/2 Volatile Skeletons. Gain 4 Armor.
flavorText: And that's why you keep your skeletons in your closet instead of your freezer.

name: Commander Sivara
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, add those spells back to your hand. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: With six legs, gills, and an impressive array of magic, Sivara is an all-terrain-spellcaster.

name: Cool Ghoul
text: Divine Shield Reborn
flavorText: He has disco fever! :D Because of the disco plague. :(

name: Cover Artist
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on our fear of you realizing we copied this flavor text.

name: Craftsman's Hammer
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: Also gives your hero Craftsmanship +1.

name: Crazed Conductor
text: Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps. Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.
flavorText: "The Twisting Nether is singing to me… WHAT IS THAT MELODY!?"

name: Crud Caretaker
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/5 Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: All it takes is a little love and a LOT of junk!

name: Crusader Aura
text: Whenever a friendly minion attacks, give it +2/+1. Lasts turns.
flavorText: Also makes your animations 20% faster.

name: Daring Drake
text: Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

name: Dark Alley Pact
text: Summon a Fiend with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavorText: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Death Strike
text: Lifesteal Deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavorText: A little embarrassing when used on large minions.

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavorText: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

name: Dew Process
text: For the rest of the game, players draw an extra card at the start of their turn.
flavorText: All part of dewing your dew diligence.

name: Disarming Elemental
text: Battlecry: Dredge for your opponent. Set its Cost to (6).
flavorText: "You can have these back when you learn to play nice."

name: Disciple of Eonar
text: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card or power has both effects combined.
flavorText: If you do not receive his rose, you will have to pack your bags and leave Ulduar immediately.

name: Disciple of Sargeras
text: Battlecry: Discard a spell to summon two 3/2 Imps. Forge: Give them +2 Health and Taunt.
flavorText: An IMP-ortant card to Forge.

name: Dispossessed Soul
text: Battlecry: If you control a location, Discover a copy of a card in your deck.
flavorText: I'm afraid it came as a great shock to her when she died.

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Drown
text: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: If you play it on a Naga, they drown in their sorrows instead.

name: E.T.C., Band Manager
text: While building your deck, assemble a band of 3 cards. Battlecry: Discover one!
flavorText: "This next band features the one and only M.C. Tech on the drums, the fungal king of the keyboard Loatheb, and the showstopping vocal chops of Spellbreaker!"

name: Elven Minstrel
text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavorText: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Eredar Deceptor
text: Whenever you draw a card, summon a 1/1 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: But they were all of them deceived, for another Eredar was made.

name: Eversong Portal
text: Summon 1 4/4 (Lynx, Lynxes) with Rush (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: In retrospect, it's pretty impressive that they had the Lynxes just ready to go.

name: Excavation Specialist
text: Battlecry: Dredge. Reduce its Cost by (1).
flavorText: With the jungles of Un’goro mapped out and the ruins of Uldum fully uncovered, explorers have to go a little out of their depth in their search of the great unknown.

name: Fal'dorei Strider
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
flavorText: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

name: Fel'dorei Warband
text: Deal 4 damage. If your deck has no minions, summon four 1/1 Illidari with Rush.
flavorText: "Felerin, I made you a friendship bracelet!" "...what? I said WARband, not WRISTband..."

name: Felerin, the Forgotten
text: Battlecry: Add a random Outcast card to the left and right sides of your hand. They cost (2) less.
flavorText: flavor text

name: Fight Over Me
text: Choose two enemy minions. They fight! Add copies of any that die to your hand.
flavorText: And you thought the battles between the Alliance and Horde got ugly…

name: Fireball
text: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Footman
text: Taunt Adjacent minions are Immune while attacking.
flavorText: Ha ha HAAAH huHAH!

name: Forge of Wills
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a Giant with its stats and Rush.
flavorText: Standing in the Forge of Wills fills you with a sense of DETERMINATION.

name: Freebird
text: Charge Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Freebird you've played this game. ( )
flavorText: Free!? But it costs Mana!

name: Glaiveshark
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Can smell a drop of vengeance in the water up to a mile away.

name: Glaivetar
text: Deathrattle: Draw (card, cards). (Play Outcast cards while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Might need tuning, I think it's a bit sharp.

name: Going Down Swinging
text: Give your hero +2 Attack and Immune this turn, then attack each enemy minion.
flavorText: Halveria was outcast from Gilneas for being too edgy, which she sees as an achievement.

name: Goldwing
text: Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Mech, gain Windfury.
flavorText: This HAS to be worth more dust, right?

name: Grave Digging
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) if a friendly Undead died after your last turn.
flavorText: Grave digging as a profession has high turnover; it's important to maintain headcount.

name: Grave Strength
text: Give your minions +1 Attack. Spend 5 Corpses to give them +3 instead.
flavorText: They're just standing there… MENACINGLY!

name: Grimtotem Buzzkill
text: Battlecry: Discard a weapon to draw 3 cards.
flavorText: I'd be mad too if you called me a 'buzzkill'.

name: Halkias
text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Store Halkias's soul inside of a friendly Secret. It resummons Halkias when triggered.
flavorText: Everybody tough until the sinstones start walking.

name: Halveria Darkraven
text: Rush After a friendly Rush minion attacks, give your minions +1 Attack.
flavorText: You know someone's cool when their name sounds like a font.

name: Heartbreaker Hedanis
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Hedanis has won over the hearts and minds of millions of fans all over Azeroth! Shadow magic had nothing to do with it - not that you asked or anything.

name: Helya
text: Battlecry: Shuffle all three Plagues into your opponent's deck. Plagues they draw this game are unending.
flavorText: Named after the first thing Odyn said after landing a sick kickflip.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavorText: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: High Cultist Basaleph
text: Battlecry: Resurrect all friendly Undead that died after your last turn.
flavorText: "It's not a cult! It's a collection of like-minded individuals that enjoy undead. And rituals. And doing what I say. "

name: Igneous Lavagorger
text: Taunt Battlecry: Dredge. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavorText: Lava shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo.

name: Ignis, the Eternal Flame
text: Battlecry: If you've Forged a card this game, craft a custom weapon.
flavorText: ETERNAL flame? He has 4 health?!

name: Immolate
text: Light every card in the opponent's hand on fire. In 3 turns, any still in hand are destroyed!
flavorText: "Well if you cared about those cards so much, why didn't you play them?"

name: Imposing Anubisath
text: Taunt Can't attack.
flavorText: He's just standing there... menacingly!

name: Incriminating Psychic
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Copy two random cards from your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

name: Infested Watcher
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get two 1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.
flavorText: This is why you don't eat watermelon seeds.

name: Instrument Smasher
text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, equip a random Demon Hunter weapon.
flavorText: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

name: Jitterbug
text: Divine Shield After a friendly character loses Divine Shield, draw a card.
flavorText: The only bug that was intentional.

name: Judge Unworthy
text: Set an enemy minion's Health to 1, then deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: VEGETABLE JUSTICE!

name: Jungle Jammer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random -Cost Beast. (Cast spells while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Keyboard Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

name: Kodohide Drumkit
text: Deathrattle: Deal damage to all minions. (Gain Armor while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Stolen from a druidic drum circle, now destined to make music that is actually good.

name: Kryxis the Voracious
text: Battlecry: Discard your hand. Deathrattle: Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Tried intermittent fasting. It didn't stick.

name: Lady Deathwhisper
text: Deathrattle: Copy all Frost spells in your hand.
flavorText: "Psst... Omelette death fromage."

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavorText: A purple stone Azari carved For dark hearts, craving, power-starved. The first to bow, the warlock Rin, Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Life Sentence
text: Remove a minion from the game.
flavorText: Also sentenced to laugh and love.

name: Lifedrinker
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Light of the Phoenix
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It's 3 in the morning, could you PLEASE put out that phoenix?!

name: Lost Exarch
text: Deathrattle: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 2/2 Zombies with Rush.
flavorText: She resisted the temptation of the Burning Legion's power only to fall victim to the Scourge.

name: Malignant Horror
text: Reborn At the end of your turn, spend 4 Corpses to summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: Pop goes the pustule.

name: Mechagnome Guide
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Forge: It costs (3) less.
flavorText: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

name: Merch Seller
text: At the end of your turn, put a random spell on the top of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: "Sorry, we're all out of Mediums. All we've got left are Gnome, Extra Large, and Annihilan."

name: Metamorphosis
text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 5 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
flavorText: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Might of Menethil
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 3 Corpses. Freeze that many enemy minions.
flavorText: Menethil's Might, at night, fights the light, not quite the blight, right?

name: Might of Menethil
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 3 Corpses. Freeze that many enemy minions.
flavorText: Menethil's Might, at night, fights the light, not quite the blight, right?

name: Mindbender
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage for each card you have drawn this turn. ( )
flavorText: I like my brain unbent, thanks.

name: Mischievous Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. Infuse ( ): Summon two copies instead.
flavorText: Why is it when something happens, it is always you three?

name: Murlocula
text: Lifesteal Infuse ( ): This costs (0).
flavorText: The best part of Murlocula is when he said "IT'S MRRGLIN' TIME" and totally mrrgled those guys.

name: Nerubian Swarmguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon two copies of this minion.
flavorText: How long can this go on? Apparently even in death.

name: Nerubian Swarmguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon two copies of this minion.
flavorText: How long can this go on? Apparently even in death.

name: Noxious Infiltrator
text: Poisonous Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 1 damage to a minion.
flavorText: Noxious, but not toxic - he's very polite!

name: Oaken Summons
text: Gain 6 Armor. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (4) or less.
flavorText: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Obsessive Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has Stealth while this is alive.
flavorText: "Obsessed? No! I'm just really really really really really really really really really really into E.T.C.'s music and everything he says, does, thinks, lives, and breathes!"

name: Orion, Mansion Manager
text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, cast a different Mage Secret and gain +2/+2.
flavorText: The secrets of the universe are vast... and will be revealed sometime later this game.

name: Park Panther
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Partner in Crime
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion at the end of your turn.
flavorText: "You know what we need? Some rope." "That's stupid. Name one thing you'd need a rope for."

name: Plaguespreader
text: Deathrattle: Transform a random minion in your opponent's hand into a Plaguespreader.
flavorText: What do they mean by Patient Zero? I'm very patient!

name: Pozzik, Audio Engineer
text: Battlecry: Add two 3/3 Bots to your opponent's hand. Deathrattle: Summon them for yourself.
flavorText: "I'm down here, fixin' all the Gnomish tech that breaks down mid-set while that buffoon Fizzle is up there taking pictures of the sky. YOU tell ME who's the better engineer!"

name: Prescience
text: Draw 2 minions. For each that costs (5) or more, summon a 2/3 Spirit with Taunt.
flavorText: Wait don't change the channel! I love this vision.

name: Prison Breaker
text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, deal 2 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Flavor fail! Demolition Renovator did it FIRST!

name: Private Eye
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck. Combo: Cast 2 instead.
flavorText: Eye see what you did there.

name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
text: Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.
flavorText: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."

name: Pyrotechnician
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Fire spell to your hand.
flavorText: The difference between a pyrotechnician and a pyromaniac is a paycheck.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Remorseless Winter
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Draw a card.
flavorText: In the Badlands, this is a Rare.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Rhythm and Roots
text: Choose One (Secretly) - Summon three 5/5 Ancients in 2 turns; or 8/8 Giants in 4 turns.
flavorText: For Zok's latest song, he decided to go back to his roots. Like the ones on a tree. Tree roots.

name: Rhythmdancer Risa
text: Rush After your hero attacks, return this to your hand and set its Cost to (1).
flavorText: Shadowstep to the left! Double jump to the right! Class cross!

name: Rotting Necromancer
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's an Undead, deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: You can't spell dredge without D-E-D.

name: Royal Librarian
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: Runefueled Golem
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon from any class.
flavorText: Hmm, glyph gauge is running low. Better fill up at the next town.

name: Sanctum Spellbender
text: Whenever your opponent targets another minion with a spell, redirect it to this.
flavorText: "I'll take that... and that... aaand that."

name: Saronite Tol'vir
text: Taunt Whenever this is attacked, draw a card.
flavorText: Talk to the hand.

name: School Teacher
text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Nagaling to your hand. Discover a spell that costs (3) or less to teach it.
flavorText: She also tutors 3 Piranha Swarmers on her off hours.

name: Scourge Illusionist
text: Deathrattle: Add a 4/4 copy of another Deathrattle minion in your deck to your hand. It costs (4) less.
flavorText: They're not tricks! They're ILLUSIONS!

name: Scuttlebutt Ghoul
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: No 'if's, 'and's, or 'scuttlebutt's'!

name: Selfish Shellfish
text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Keeps any ancient book it finds all to its shelf.

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavorText: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Serenity
text: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack. Destroy any with 0 Attack.
flavorText: Ra-den loves teaching yoga on his off-hours.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Shockspitter
text: Battlecry: Deal damage. (Improved by your hero attacks this game!)
flavorText: That blue raspberry candy was very sour.

name: Sickly Grimewalker
text: After you summon an Undead, give it Poisonous.
flavorText: Anyone want some CHEEEEEESE?

name: Sightless Magistrate
text: Battlecry: Both players draw until they have 5 cards.
flavorText: Does "Justice is Blind" still apply with Spectral Sight?

name: Silvermoon Armorer
text: Rush Manathirst ( ): Gain +2/+2.
flavorText: All that glitters is silver.

name: Sinister Soulcage
text: Give a friendly Undead +2/+2. Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Also a pretty neat night light!

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Souleater's Scythe
text: Start of Game: Consume 3 different minions in your deck. Leave behind Souls that Discover them.
flavorText: Would you like those souls for here or to-go?

name: Speaker Stomper
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (2) more next turn.
flavorText: Just like in Hoofloose.

name: Spectral Cutlass
text: Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Spitelash Siren
text: After you play a Naga, refresh two Mana Crystals. (Then switch to spell!) After you cast a spell, refresh two Mana Crystals. (Then switch to Naga!)
flavorText: Refresh the rainbow.

name: Spread the Word
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each Attack your hero has.
flavorText: W O R D

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Stonebound Gargon
text: Rush Infuse ( ): Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: Really good at "stay."

name: Stoneheart King
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
flavorText: I, too, am a king at playing Heart Stone.

name: Street Sweeper
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: The sweeper hit of the set.

name: Sunfire Smithing
text: Equip a 4/2 Sword. Give a random minion in your hand +4/+2.
flavorText: It's simple, just throw it into the sun.

name: Swiftscale Trickster
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavorText: If you play your cards fast enough, who's to say how much they cost?

name: Tear Reality
text: Add 2 random Mage spells from the past to your hand. They cost (2) less.
flavorText: One time it gave me a black flower, a smiling pot, and a foil first edition Dracthyr.

name: Tempest Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: LIKE SWATTING PESTS!

name: Thassarian
text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: A natural born leader. And an unnatural reborn leader.

name: The Stonewright
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Totems have +2 Attack.
flavorText: She wrights stone better than she reads it.

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Thori'belore
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Cast a Fire spell to revive Thori'belore!
flavorText: Mascot of QFC (Quel'Thelas Fried Chicken).

name: Tidelost Burrower
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Murloc, summon a 2/2 copy of it.
flavorText: Burrowing may not be for everyone, but I dig it.

name: Timber Tambourine
text: Deathrattle: Summon 5/5 (Ancient, Ancients). (Play cards that cost (5) or more while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

name: Time-Lost Protodrake
text: Taunt When you draw this, add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavorText: Weird way to say "late" but ok.

name: Tiny Worldbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: "I'm doing my part!"

name: Tomb Guardians
text: Summon two 2/2 Zombies with Taunt. Spend 4 Corpses to give them Reborn.
flavorText: An absolute thriller.

name: Tomb Traitor
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Plague in your opponent's deck to deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: You enjoy raiding, I enjoying traitoring. We are not the same.

name: Topple the Idol
text: Dredge. Reveal it and deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: No Old Gods or Kings, only Naga.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twinbow Terrorcoil
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, your next spell casts twice.
flavorText: Two shots. Two kills.

name: Twisted Frostwing
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.
flavorText: Not currently valid in the Twist format.

name: Twisted Tether
text: Destroy a minion. Give its stats to a random Undead in your hand.
flavorText: First, convince your opponent that you just want to play tetherball. Then, you GET 'EM!

name: Unchained Gladiator
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn. ( )
flavorText: We can't possibly buff this card any more, just look at him!

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Volume Up
text: Draw 3 spells. Finale: Discover a copy of one.
flavorText: You have to pay Mana to do that!? I thought it was just in the settings menu!

name: Widowbloom Seedsman
text: Battlecry: Draw a Nature spell. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Sometimes a blue thumb is better than a green one.

name: Wing Welding
text: Discard your highest Cost card. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: This is not how you train your dragon.

name: Yelling Yodeler
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavorText: Maybe it's OK for the Grimtotem to destroy some music forever.

name: All Fel Breaks Loose
text: Summon a friendly Demon that died this game. Infuse ( Demons): Summon three instead.
flavorText: Maybe we should have made the bars closer together…

name: Altered Chord
text: Lifesteal Deal 6 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you're Overloaded.
flavorText: I'll never understand how bands and orchestras allow musicians that just…. play... off-key. Would love opinions on this.

name: Amorphous Slime
text: Battlecry: Discard a random Undead. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: A crucial component of the Lordaeroneon Choice Awards.

name: Ara'lon
text: Battlecry: Summon one of each Dormant Wildseed.
flavorText: If I had a nickel for every time a Hunter Legendary minion in Castle Nathria summoned three different companions, I'd have two nickels - which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.

name: Army of the Dead
text: Raise up to 5 Corpses as 2/2 Risen Ghouls with Rush.
flavorText: Yesterday's army, today.

name: Azsharan Sentinel
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Sentinel' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: For some, the Sundering was the collapse of civilization. For others, it was a great core workout.

name: Azsharan Vessel
text: Summon two 3/3 Pirates with Stealth. Put a 'Sunken Vessel' on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Not even the sturdiest Highborne ship could survive the churning waters of the Sundering.

name: Barak Kodobane
text: Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, and 3-Cost spell.
flavorText: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Beetlemancy
text: Choose One - Gain 12 Armor; or Summon two 3/3 Beetles with Taunt.
flavorText: Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy. Beetlemancy.

name: Big Dreams
text: Summon the highest Cost Beast from your hand. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavorText: Just a small town Taunka Livin' in a lonely... waunka

name: Blackrock 'n' Roll
text: Give all minions in your deck Attack and Health equal to their Cost.
flavorText: Thank goodness it's not called Black-ska Mountain.

name: Blood Boil
text: Lifesteal Infect all enemy minions. At the end of your turns, they take 2 damage.
flavorText: And once your blood is at a boil, throw in the plaguetti.

name: Blood Treant
text: Costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: The blood of my enemies makes for some great fertilizer!

name: Bone Glaive
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavorText: Resourceful Demon Hunters find a use for every part of the Demon.

name: Boneshredder
text: Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to trigger and gain the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: Is that his makeup or just his natural fur pattern?

name: Bootstrap Sunkeneer
text: Combo: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Part of the deck, part of the crew.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavorText: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Bridge Riff
text: Summon a 3/4 Rocker with Taunt and a 4/3 with Rush. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavorText: Can be played in other places too.

name: Clean the Scene
text: Destroy all minions with 3 or less Attack. Infuse ( ): 6 or less.
flavorText: Not even the holy Light can get anima out of white silk.

name: Command of Neptulon
text: Summon two 5/4 Elementals with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavorText: "REVENANT TO F6. CHECKMATE, OZUMAT!"

name: Commander Ulthok
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's cards cost Health instead of Mana next turn.
flavorText: He likes to spend his free time in his garden, growing Bloodradish, Bloodcabbage, and his favorite, Bloodbloom.

name: Coral Keeper
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/3 Elemental for each spell school you've cast this game.
flavorText: This here is Carl. They're in charge of these elementals. Not all of them get along, so sometimes Carl corrals the quarreling coral.

name: Corpse Bride
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 10 Corpses to summon a Risen Groom with Taunt and that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: Until undeath do us part.

name: Corpse Bride
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 10 Corpses to summon a Risen Groom with Taunt and that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: Until undeath do us part.

name: Corpse Explosion
text: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavorText: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Corpse Explosion
text: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavorText: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Deal with a Devil
text: Summon two 3/3 Felfiends with Lifesteal. If your deck has no minions, summon two more.
flavorText: Fine, three Felfiends - final offer.

name: Death Blossom Whomper
text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion and gain its Deathrattle.
flavorText: We call her Audrey II. She was named after her mother.

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Return this to your hand. It costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: "In hindsight, maybe I should have let the Alliance have all the fun back at the Wrathgate."

name: Disciple of Amitus
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "Oh great Amitus, I took your style advice on the poncho, but pray tell - one or two golden gloves?"

name: Disguised K'thir
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform into a random card in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: That is not a very good disguise, dude.

name: Disruptive Spellbreaker
text: At the end of your turn, your opponent discards a spell.
flavorText: WHO IS THE BLOOD ELVES' DENTIST?

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavorText: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Drum Soloist
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
flavorText: "Was I rushin' or was I dragon?"

name: Elder Nadox
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Undead. Your minions gain its Attack.
flavorText: For an Undead, is an elder the least or most dead?

name: Elite Tauren Champion
text: Finale: Start a ROCK DUEL! Players must spend all their Mana each turn or else they take 8 (or more) damage!
flavorText: Strumming his guitar with a molten ember from the first fire of Azeroth, E.T.C.'s ear-splitting, heart-wrenching, head-banging solo held back Magatha and her forces of evil, single-handedly saving music for centuries to come.

name: Elitist Snob
text: Battlecry: For each Paladin card in your hand, randomly gain Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Rush, or Taunt.
flavorText: "I heard the Sire invited a Murloc! How dreadful!"

name: Eye of Chaos
text: Battlecry: Get two 1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.
flavorText: Aye aye aye (OF CHAOS)

name: Famished Fool
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Infuse ( ): Draw 3 instead.
flavorText: He's not hungry for food, he's starving for attention!

name: Flipper Friends
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Orca with Taunt; or six 1/1 Otters with Rush.
flavorText: Despite the harsh conditions, friends can still be found under the sea.

name: Gangplank Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn. Rush. Immune while attacking.
flavorText: Cownonball!

name: Ghost Writer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Finale: Discover another.
flavorText: This eccentric scribe was cursed to an afterlife of never being recognized for his talents! Muahaha!

name: Gorloc Ravager
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 Murlocs.
flavorText: Be careful what you fish for.

name: Greybough
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
flavorText: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Guitar Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, draw a spell, a minion, and a weapon.
flavorText: She is the hero of the guitar. The guitar hero. Trademark.

name: Harkener of Dread
text: Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Undead with Taunt.
flavorText: I hope it's good news!

name: Harmonic Disco
text: Discover a 5-Cost minion. Summon it with +1/+1. (Swaps each turn.)
flavorText: "Worry not, festival patrons! A disco is hardly any means for panic!"

name: Infantry Reanimator
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly Undead. Give it Reborn.
flavorText: Get a life! Or two!

name: Infectious Ghoul
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon an Infectious Ghoul."
flavorText: They call him that because of his laughter! Also his plague.

name: Ini Stormcoil
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it with Rush, Windfury, and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).

name: Inquisitive Creation
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
flavorText: This mech eats books for breakfast.

name: Inzah
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Overload cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!

name: JIVE, INSECT!
text: Transform a minion into Ragnaros the Firelord. Overload: (2)
flavorText: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

name: Jotun, the Eternal
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, cast a copy of the first spell you draw each turn at enemies.
flavorText: He doesn't look like a turtle?

name: Justicar Trueheart
text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavorText: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Kangor, Dancing King
text: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your hand and give it Lifesteal.
flavorText: After Dr. Boom's involvement with the League of EVIL, Kangor cut ties with the Boomsday Labs and began pursuing his true passion - DISCO!!!

name: Keeper's Strength
text: Give a friendly minion +2/+2. Deal its Attack damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Finders keepers, losers DIE.

name: Lab Constructor
text: At the end of your turn, summon a copy of this. Forge: Gain Magnetic.
flavorText: As Mimiron foretold: "Twinsies!"

name: Lady Ashvane
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand, deck, and battlefield +1/+1.
flavorText: This is your brain on Azerite.

name: Lady Darkvein
text: Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Shades. Each gains a Deathrattle to cast your last Shadow spell.
flavorText: You're so vein. I bet you think this flavor text is about you.

name: Lady Naz'jar
text: While in your hand, this transforms after you cast a Fire, Frost, or Arcane spell.
flavorText: Talk about an identity crisis.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavorText: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: MC Blingtron
text: Battlecry: Both players equip 1/2 Microphones. Your opponent's increases all damage they take by 1!
flavorText: If this is the outcome of the robot uprising, then sign me up!

name: Magatha, Bane of Music
text: Battlecry: Draw 5 cards. Give any spells drawn to your opponent.
flavorText: Not to be confused with that one other "-agatha" that likes when you play minions.

name: Mawsworn Bailiff
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 4 or more Armor, gain +4/+4.
flavorText: Bailiff, bring in the dancing lobsters!

name: Mind Control Tech
text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one.
flavorText: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

name: Momentum
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavorText: "Mass Times Velocity" wasn't as catchy.

name: Muck Plumber
text: ALL minions cost (2) more.
flavorText: If you drink muck, you go to the Maw before you die.

name: Necrolord Draka
text: Battlecry: Equip a /3 Dagger. (+1 Attack for each other card you played this turn!)
flavorText: We originally planned on giving Rogue a Legendary minion called "The Moon", but SOMEONE jumped in the frame.

name: Night Elf Huntress
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to three different enemies. (You pick the targets!)
flavorText: A triple threat, all on her own.

name: Opera Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: It ain't over until the imp mother sings.

name: Overlord Runthak
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand.
flavorText: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.

name: Queen Azshara
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, choose an Ancient Relic. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Hobbies include: Ordering subjects around, making deals with old gods, and taking long walks under the beach.

name: Relic of Dimensions
text: Draw two cards and reduce their Cost by ( ). Improve your future Relics.
flavorText: A glaive is a glaive, but a mystery box could be anything! It could even be a glaive!

name: Remixed Rhapsody
text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavorText: "Is this real life?" "No, this is a card game."

name: Rin, Orchestrator of Doom
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Both players draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards, and destroy the top 2 cards of their deck.
flavorText: Rin's orchestra is the best of the best. When your replacement is just one summoning away, you have to play perfectly.

name: Rotgill
text: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1."
flavorText: In the summer: Hotgill. Mechanized: Botgill. Everyone else: Notgill.

name: Savage Ymirjar
text: Rush Battlecry: Discard 2 cards.
flavorText: When is an Undead door not an Undead door? When it's a(Ymir)jar!

name: Screaming Banshee
text: Lifesteal After your hero gains Health, summon a Soul with that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: Her singing will be sure to wake you up (wake you up inside).

name: Shadehound
text: Whenever this attacks, give your other Beasts +2/+2. Infuse ( Beasts): Gain Rush.
flavorText: This Shadehound wasn't just a good boy. He was the best.

name: Shadow Waltz
text: Summon a 3/5 Shadow with Taunt. If a minion died this turn, summon another.
flavorText: They're dancing to one of Rin's demonic symphonies. Her music might not be famous now, but just you wait!

name: Shadow Word: Undeath
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, deal 2 more.
flavorText: We like to call it FUNdeath here!

name: Sinrunner
text: Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Blanchy was said to be an affectionate and well-behaved horse in life. How she ended up in Revendreth? We're too afraid to ask.

name: Soul Barrage
text: When you play or discard this, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Works especially well on jazz musicians.

name: Soul Seeker
text: Battlecry: Swap this with a random minion from your opponent's deck.
flavorText: The Soul Seeker's job is to look for a snitch.

name: Star Power
text: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion. Repeat this with 1 less damage.
flavorText: Five of the spectators were star-struck.

name: Steamcleaner
text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.
flavorText: Business is slow since the anima shortage began. Things just don't get stained like they used to!

name: Stoneborn Accuser
text: Infuse ( ): Gain "Battlecry: Deal 5 damage."
flavorText: "I SAW THEM VENT, I SWEAR!"

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Summer Flowerchild
text: Battlecry: Draw two cards that cost (6) or more. Finale: They cost (1) less.
flavorText: "Ugh, those Winter Floweradults just don't get our music."

name: Switcheroo
text: Draw 2 minions. Swap their Health.
flavorText: Would you rather fight one Whale-sized Goldfish, or 100 Goldfish-sized Whales?

name: Symphony of Sins
text: Discover and play a Movement. Shuffle the other 6 into your deck.
flavorText: Makes for some killer final boss music.

name: Taelan Fordring

flavorText: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.

name: Tainted Remnant
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 7 damage randomly split between all enemies.
flavorText: A sore sight of eyesores for sore eyes.

name: Tenacious San'layn
text: Lifesteal Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Once bitten, twice healed.

name: The Purator
