flavorText: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

name: Tram Operator
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. The next Mech you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: The guy in the back is screaming… because the train ride is so fun!

name: Translocation Instructor
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
flavorText: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.

name: Tyr's Tears
text: Resurrect 3 different minions from your class. Set their stats to 2/2. Forge: Resurrect another.
flavorText: Liek this if u cri evertim

name: Vexallus
text: Your Arcane spells cast twice.
flavorText: He only casts the spells once - it's Shmexallus that casts the copy.

name: Wargear
text: Magnetic
flavorText: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

name: Warsong Grunt
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavorText: Where do you think the chickens learned to be angry?

name: Wisdom of Norgannon
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each different spell school you've cast this game.
flavorText: Now all we need is the power and courage of Norgannon.

name: XB-488 Disposalbot
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Forge: Gain Lifesteal.
flavorText: You'll be so surprised when you figure out what XB stands for.

name: Za'qul
text: Your Abyssal Curses heal you for the damage they deal. Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavorText: Everything’s going exzaq’ully to plan.

name: Abyssal Wave
text: Deal 4 damage to all minions. Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavorText: Often followed up with a chasmic handshake.

name: Aggramar, the Avenger
text: Titan Battlecry: Equip a 3/3 Taeshalach.
flavorText: Formerly a trusted lieutenant of Sargeras, Aggramar helped him fight the demonic legions across many worlds before he was corrupted.

name: Barbaric Sorceress
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Cost of a random spell in each player's hand.
flavorText: Her four arms are for casting, and her forearms are for crushing.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavorText: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Blood Crusader
text: Battlecry: Your next Paladin minion this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: Defending Silvermoon takes a lot of blood, sweat, tears, and blood.

name: Blood in the Water
text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Summon a 5/5 Shark with Rush.
flavorText: Fish are friends, not food! Gilgoblins on the other hand…

name: Bog Beast
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/4 Muckmare with Taunt.
flavorText: I'm sure at least one of those bones is from an actual beast.

name: Bonelord Frostwhisper
text: Deathrattle: For the rest of the game, your first card each turn costs (0). You die in 3 turns.
flavorText: Downside? Not if you want to be a Death Knight!

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Cho'gall, Twilight Chieftain
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Start of Game: 50% chance to corrupt the game with a random anomaly.
flavorText: He's got it all, the gumption, gall, and Cho.

name: Coilskar Commander
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon two copies of this. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Then thou shalt count to three, no more, no less. Three shall be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out.

name: Contract Conjurer
text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.
flavorText: This document looks illegally binding.

name: Crabatoa
text: Colossal +2 Your Crabatoa Claws have +2 Attack.
flavorText: This giant crab loves to sink entire naval fleets, but it'll settle for a single dinghy in a pinch.

name: Crash of Thunder
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Nature spell you've cast this turn.
flavorText: ERROR: Lightning.exe has stopped working.

name: Death Beetle
text: Taunt Manathirst ( ): Gain +4/+4 and Charge.
flavorText: Well that'll be useless next expansion. WINK WINK.

name: Deathborne
text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton for each killed.
flavorText: Kel'Thuzad thinks adding a silent 'e' at the end of words makes them sound cooler.

name: Decimator Olgra
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion, then attack all enemies.
flavorText: FOUND HER!

name: Defense Attorney Nathanos
text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Gain its Deathrattle and then trigger it.
flavorText: "Your Honor, my client was simply trying a new tree trimming technique!"

name: Dirge of Despair
text: Deal 3 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a Demon from your deck.
flavorText: Oh, the misery!

name: Druid of the Claw
text: Choose One - Transform into a 7/6 with Rush; or a 4/9 with Taunt.
flavorText: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Rush Divine Shield Elusive
flavorText: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Felscale Evoker
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon a different Demon from your deck. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: So it’s a demon and a naga, but NOT a dragon?

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Flame Behemoth
text: Battlecry: Get two random Magnetic Mechs. They cost (2) less.
flavorText: Always look both ways before crossing the Formation Grounds.

name: Fleshshaper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 5 or more Armor, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Even THIS is better than paper straws.

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
flavorText: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.
flavorText: Death Nights, Frost Morn, what's next - Blood Noon?

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.
flavorText: Death Nights, Frost Morn, what's next - Blood Noon?

name: Gnome Muncher
text: Taunt, Lifesteal At the end of your turn, attack the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: Gnom gnom gnom.

name: Gnomelia, S.A.F.E. Pilot
text: Rush. Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Never learned how to L.A.N.D.

name: Golganneth, the Thunderer
text: Titan Your first spell each turn costs (3) less.
flavorText: With dominion over the seas and skies, Golganneth fearlessly wields the power of nature to serve the Pantheon.

name: Green-Thumb Gardener
text: Battlecry: Refresh empty Mana Crystals equal to the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand.
flavorText: Sometimes all a plant needs is, like, A LOT of water.

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Harmonic Pop
text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Popstar. (Swaps each turn.)
flavorText: Here with supporting vocals: Snap and Crackle!

name: Hollow Hound
text: Lifesteal, Rush Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: Uh oh, the hollow hound is coming out of its cage! Don't worry though, it's doing just fine.

name: Hope of Quel'Thalas
text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1 (wherever they are).
flavorText: Hey, give me a minute. I just need to load my.... uh, hope.

name: Horn of the Windlord
text: Windfury Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its stats to 3/3.
flavorText: Woodwinds! Obey my command!

name: Imp King Rafaam
text: Battlecry: Resurrect four friendly Imps. Infuse ( ): Give your Imps +2/+2.
flavorText: Not even death can stop Rafaam from pursuing a life of crime.

name: Khaz'goroth
text: Titan After this uses an ability, gain Immune this turn and attack a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Creator of the titan-forged races, Khaz'goroth intended them to safeguard the world of Azeroth from corruption and discord.

name: Lead Dancer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
flavorText: "Follow my lead!" *dies*

name: Life from Death
text: Draw 3 cards. Infuse ( ): This costs (1).
flavorText: Just because you came up with a nicer name for it doesn't mean that necromancy is any more justified.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Loken, Jailer of Yogg-Saron
text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Summon a Tentacle with its stats and Taunt.
flavorText: Really great at his job! - Yogg-Saron

name: Marrow Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 5 Corpses. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy for each.
flavorText: Also buffs your Calcium by 1000mg.

name: Marrow Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 5 Corpses. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy for each.
flavorText: Also buffs your Calcium by 1000mg.

name: Masked Reveler
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 copy of another minion in your deck.
flavorText: "It's party time! P-A-R-T-Why? Because I gotta!"

name: Minotauren
text: Rush Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavorText: "Why's he so mad?" "He's been stuck on one of Hearthstone's hidden maze puzzles for YEARS."

name: Mister Mukla
text: Rush. Battlecry: Fill your opponent's hand with Bananas.
flavorText: Music is Mukla's escape from his anger. When he's on-stage, it's like he's a whole different gorilla… Until you boo him.

name: Mothership
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon two random Mechs that cost (3) or less.
flavorText: Has been known to abduct sea cows and leave kelp circles.

name: Norgannon
text: Titan After this uses an ability, double the power of the other abilities.
flavorText: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

name: Ra-den
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon each other minion you've played this game that did not start in your deck.
flavorText: Regularly participates in Immortal Combat.

name: Rivendare, Warrider
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle the other 3 Horsemen into your deck.
flavorText: More like the 4 Horsemen of the "Can't Get Here On Time."

name: Sanitize
text: Deal damage equal to your Armor to all minions. Forge: Gain 4 Armor first.
flavorText: We were originally going to make a joke about a popular streamer, but one of our designers is a total germaphobe.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavorText: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Scribbling Stenographer
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavorText: A truly staggering 180 scribbles per minute!

name: Shatterskin Gargoyle
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Don't worry, this one's just a statue.

name: Sif
text: Spell Damage + (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
flavorText: She is Sif. He is Malygos. They are not the same person. They may have similar spell damage, they may have similar colors but they are different nonetheless.

name: Silverfury Stalwart
text: Rush Elusive Taunt
flavorText: Don't strike until you see the whites of their teeth.

name: Sister Svalna
text: Battlecry: Permanently add a Vision of Darkness to your hand.
flavorText: Hello darkness my old friend.

name: Spikeridged Steed
text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavorText: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Starstrung Bow
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game.
flavorText: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Sylvanas, the Accused
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Infuse ( ): Take control of it instead.
flavorText: Turns into 'Sylvanas, the Infused'.

name: Theotar, the Mad Duke
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in each player's hand and swap them.
flavorText: "I'm afraid you've gone mad! You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best souls are."

name: Thing from Below
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Tome Tampering
text: Shuffle 1-Cost copies of cards in your hand into your deck, then discard your hand.
flavorText: An overdue book calls for a do-over.

name: Tyr
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a 2, 3, and 4-Attack minion from your class.
flavorText: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

name: Unending Swarm
text: Resurrect all friendly minions that cost (2) or less.
flavorText: swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm swarm -

name: Unpopular Has-Been
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavorText: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back then…

name: V-07-TR-0N Prime
text: T1T4N This minion's abilities repeat on another random friendly minion.
flavorText: Long after the titans' departure, Mimiron dreamed of creating something with an approximation of their power. He may have actually succeeded!

name: Zok Fogsnout
text: Battlecry: Summon two / Quilboar with Taunt. (Improved by your hero Attack & Armor gained this turn!)
flavorText: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.

name: Abyssal Bassist
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (2) less for each weapon you've equipped this game.
flavorText: DROP THE BASS (INTO THE ABYSS)!

name: Alexandros Mograine
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, deal 3 damage to your opponent at the end of your turns.
flavorText: Mo' graine, mo' problems.

name: Aman'Thul
text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover any Legendary minion.
flavorText: The leader of the titans was the first to awaken. In his loneliness, he sought out other titans across many different worlds, and together, they formed the Pantheon.

name: Amitus, the Peacekeeper
text: Titan Taunt. Your minions can't take more than 2 damage at a time.
flavorText: As a champion of harmony, Amitus abstained from the Pantheon's many conflicts until one day, shortly after the corruption of Sargeras, she vanished altogether.

name: Anachronos
text: Battlecry: Send all other minions 2 turns into the future.
flavorText: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

name: Ancient of Growth
text: Choose One - Summon three 2/2 Treants; or Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients with Taunt.
flavorText: Who passed greenhouse gas?

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 7 Health.
flavorText: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavorText: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Argus, the Emerald Star
text: Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
flavorText: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Blackscale Brute
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, summon a 5/6 Naga with Rush.
flavorText: Black, the scales of angry Naga! Red, the flames of Azshari's past!

name: Blackwater Behemoth
text: Colossal +1 Lifesteal
flavorText: What's a Blackwater Behemoth's favorite meal? Fish n' Ships.

name: Blightblood Berserker
text: Taunt, Lifesteal, Reborn Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: He should really go see a dentist about that tusk. And a dermatologist. And a therapist.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
flavorText: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Colaque
text: Colossal +1 Immune while you control Colaque's Shell.
flavorText: Ten thousand years ago, the city of Zin-Azshari fell to the bottom of the sea... and partially onto Colaque's shell.

name: Containment Unit
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavorText: Surprisingly ticklish.

name: Dar'Khan Drathir
text: Lifesteal At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: You're telling me that you didn't suspect him of being evil, even though the first four letters of his name are D-A-R-K?

name: Divine Toll
text: Shoot 5 rays at random minions. They give friendly minions +2/+2, and deal 2 damage to enemy minions.
flavorText: Never send to know for whom the bell tolls.

name: Doomkin
text: Battlecry: Take one of your opponent's empty Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Now THIS is Mana cheating.

name: Drum Circle
text: Choose One - Summon five 2/2 Treants; or Give your minions +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavorText: It's more of a drum pentagon, really.

name: Elemental Inspiration
text: For each spell school you have cast this game, summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random bonus effect. ( )
flavorText: No Hero Power required.

name: Expendable Performers
text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If they all die this turn, summon seven more.
flavorText: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

name: Faithful Companions
text: Discover a Beast from your deck and summon it. Manathirst ( ): Also summon a copy of it.
flavorText: That's just how they cuddle!

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal 6 damage. Summon a random 6-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Frost Queen Sindragosa
text: Colossal +2 After an enemy minion is Frozen, destroy it.
flavorText: With her final breath, Sindragosa cursed her consort and all who abandoned her to die in Icecrown. When she was reborn by the hands of the Lich King, her first freezing exhale wrought only pain.

name: Frostwyrm's Fury
text: Deal 5 damage. Freeze all enemy minions. Summon a 5/5 Frostwyrm.
flavorText: Terrible destruction, but minty fresh breath!

name: Frostwyrm's Fury
text: Deal 5 damage. Freeze all enemy minions. Summon a 5/5 Frostwyrm.
flavorText: Terrible destruction, but minty fresh breath!

name: General Vezax
text: Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.
flavorText: Contrast this with Specific Vezax, who only gets resummoned if you have exactly 4 Armor.

name: Glugg the Gulper
text: Colossal +3 After a friendly minion dies, gain its original stats.
flavorText: Food can be scarce in the Abyssal Depths, leading its top predators to pursue any potential source of sustenance. Even extra crunchy ones.

name: Hedra the Heretic
text: Battlecry: For each spell you've cast while holding this, summon a minion of that spell's Cost.
flavorText: Hedra was cast out millennia ago for her divisive opinions among the Naga, such as "Turning into evil underwater serpent people was bad, actually."

name: Huntsman Altimor
text: Battlecry: Summon a Gargon Companion. Infuse ( ): Summon another. Infuse ( ): And another!
flavorText: He loves all his Gargons equally. (Hecutis is his favorite and it's not close.)

name: Hydralodon
text: Colossal +2 Battlecry: Give your Hydralodon Heads Rush.
flavorText: Deep beneath the waves, this hydra grew to incredible size based on a steady diet of literally anything that crossed its path.

name: Immortalized in Stone
text: Summon a 1/2, 2/4, and 4/8 Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: They all secretly have 'Deathrattle: Become very mortalized.'

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
flavorText: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: Lady Liadrin
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavorText: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavorText: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

name: Lor'themar Theron
text: Battlecry: Double the stats of all minions in your deck.
flavorText: Out of all his life accomplishments, making a 2/2 Tinyfin is his finest.

name: Miracle Growth
text: Draw 3 cards. Summon a Plant with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavorText: I’ve got NO idea what’s in that fertilizer.

name: Mythical Terror
text: Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
flavorText: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

name: Nellie, the Great Thresher
text: Colossal +1 Battlecry: Discover 3 Pirates to crew Nellie's Ship!
flavorText: Not to be mistaken for her freshwater cousin, Nessie, this massive creature was harnessed to carry Hooktusk's favorite ship.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
text: Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns are only 15 seconds long.
flavorText: Live life in the fast lane. As long as your opponent does too.

name: Pack the House
text: Summon a random 6, 5, 4, and 3-Cost minion. Overload: (2)
flavorText: How many Pack the Houses would a pack house if a pack could house Pack the House?

name: Pirate Admiral Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: If you've summoned 7 other Pirates this game, plunder the enemy! ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: You win some, you ransom.

name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
text: Choose a character. Cast 4 random spells (targeting it if possible).
flavorText: "We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?" "How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?" "PERFECT!"

name: Red Herring
text: Taunt Your non-Red Herring minions have Stealth.
flavorText: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

name: Remornia, Living Blade
text: Rush After this attacks, equip it.
flavorText: Was it the lead pipe... the candlestick... or the unhinged, sentient, bloodthirsty sword?

name: Siamat
text: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavorText: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Sinfueled Golem
text: Infuse ( ): Gain stats equal to the Attack of the minions that Infused this.
flavorText: That poor golem is going to be stuck as a guard forever. He can never get a head!

name: Slithering Deathscale
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, deal 3 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Colossal minions know her better as Slithering Damagescale.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Tess Greymane
text: Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: The Countess
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 3 Legendary Invitations to your hand.
flavorText: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!

name: The Leviathan
text: Colossal +1 Rush, Divine Shield After this attacks, Dredge.
flavorText: Built by Ini Stormcoil, this massive vessel can withstand almost anything you put it through... although she would prefer you didn't!

name: The One-Amalgam Band
text: Battlecry: Gain a random bonus effect for each minion of a different type you've played this game. ( )
flavorText: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!

name: Thorignir Drake
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
flavorText: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

name: Tony, King of Piracy
text: Battlecry: Replace your deck with a copy of your opponent's. Finale: Draw a card.
flavorText: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.

name: Topior the Shrubbagazzor
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you cast a Nature spell, summon a 3/3 Whelp with Rush.
flavorText: They got a dragon that burns 1000 gallons of anima a week.

name: Trial by Fire
text: Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.
flavorText: Well, in ya go.

name: Underking
text: Rush Battlecry and Deathrattle: Gain 6 Armor.
flavorText: "Behold, the Underking! I'm always beneath you, but nothing is beneath me! I hereby declare war on peace and happiness! Soon, all will tremble before me!"

name: Vengeful Walloper
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each Outcast card you've played this game.
flavorText: If you can't beat 'em, beat WITH 'em!

name: Wrathspine Enchanter
text: Battlecry: Cast a copy of a Fire, Frost, and Nature spell in your hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: If he could see, he might be better at targeting.

name: Xhilag of the Abyss
text: Colossal +4 At the start of your turn, increase the damage of Xhilag's Stalks by 1.
flavorText: When ancient heroes drove a felhunter into the sea, they thought it was the end. But for Xhilag, it was only the beginning...

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavorText: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Anub'Rekhan
text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor. Your next 3 minions this turn cost Armor instead of Mana.
flavorText: "Who's that?" "A noob, I reckon."

name: Arcane Defenders
text: Summon two 5/6 Golems with Taunt and Elusive.
flavorText: *Arcane batteries not included*

name: Artificer Xy'mox
text: Battlecry: Discover and cast a Relic. Infuse ( ): Cast all three instead.
flavorText: "The anticipation to use this relic is killing me! Though, it will more likely kill you."

name: Boneguard Commander
text: Taunt Battlecry: Raise up to 6 Corpses as 1/3 Risen Footmen with Taunt.
flavorText: Commander? In Hearthstone!? FINALLY!

name: Cage Head
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/9 Blight Boar with Charge and Taunt.
flavorText: You get your head stuck in a cage ONCE, and all of a sudden you've got a new nickname.

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavorText: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Collateral Damage
text: Deal 6 damage to three random enemy minions. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.

name: Concert Promo-Drake
text: Tradeable Finale: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavorText: There's a reason why it's promoting the festival instead of playing in it - it's a rhyme-lost protodrake.

name: Criminal Lineup
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon 3 copies of it. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Number 1, could you please sing the opening to "I Want It That Way"?

name: Crypt Keeper
text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Armor you have.
flavorText: How many crypts could a Crypt Keeper keep if a Crypt Keeper could keep crypts?

name: Cultivation
text: Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less for each Treant you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
flavorText: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavorText: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
text: Choose One - Duplicate your hand; or Summon copies of all other friendly minions.
flavorText: Good things come in pairs. Good things come in pairs.

name: Gaia, the Techtonic
text: Colossal +2 After a friendly Mech attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Always planning ahead, Ini knew she'd need this invention to protect all her other inventions.

name: Gigafin
text: Colossal +1. Battlecry: Devour all enemy minions. Deathrattle: Spit them back out.
flavorText: How much storage does Gigafin's Maw have? About a giga bite.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Hodir, Father of Giants
text: Battlecry: Set the stats of the next three minions you play to 8/8.
flavorText: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

name: Illidari Inquisitor
text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
flavorText: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.

name: Invincible
text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly Undead +5/+5 and Taunt.
flavorText: No it's not, I can see it right there.

name: Kael'thas Sinstrider
text: Every third minion you play each turn costs (0).
flavorText: You heard about Kael'thas? That's messed up, right?

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Kel'Thuzad, the Inevitable
text: Battlecry: Resurrect your Volatile Skeletons. Any that can't fit on the battlefield instantly explode! ( )
flavorText: Looks like Kel'Thuzad is borrowing some of Mr. Bigglesworth's nine lives.

name: Kologarn
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your hand to your opponent's.
flavorText: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Mish-Mash Mosher
text: Rush After this attacks, gain +1 Attack and attack a random enemy minion.
flavorText: In the pit, he feels more alive than ever.

name: Nightshade Bud
text: Choose One - Discover a minion from your deck to summon; or a spell to cast.
flavorText: It actually thrives in partial sunlight.

name: Ozumat
text: Colossal +6 Deathrattle: For each of Ozumat's Tentacles, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Deathrattle: You'll be octo-sorry.

name: Party Crasher
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Throw a random minion from your hand at it.
flavorText: "Do you ever wonder why you don't get invited anywhere?" "… no, not really."

name: Primordial Drake
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Sesselie of the Fae Court
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a minion. Reduce its Cost by (8).
flavorText: They claim they're from the Fae Court, but that might be a Fae Kout.

name: Shapeless Constellation
text: Battlecry: Transform into an 8/8 copy of a random minion in your hand.
flavorText: Galaxy Brain.

name: Son of Hodir
text: Battlecry: Shuffle four 8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
flavorText: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

name: Soulstealer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
flavorText: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

name: Soulstealer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
flavorText: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

name: Storm Giant
text: Taunt Forge: Costs (2) less. Can be Forged endlessly.
flavorText: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!

name: Stranglethorn Heart
text: Tradeable Resurrect all friendly Beasts that cost (5) or more.
flavorText: The Stranglethorn mentality is to be happy with the bare necessities.

name: The Primus
text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
flavorText: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

name: Tidal Revenant
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage. Gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: A big minion that clears the board and gains Armor? Wow, Warrior is really in their element now.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Torghast Custodian
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, randomly gain Rush, Divine Shield, or Windfury.
flavorText: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions and locations.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Whirlpool
text: Destroy all minions and all copies of them (wherever they are).
flavorText: In the southern hemisphere, it actually summons all minions instead.

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavorText: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone. Except Deathwing. And Malygos. And Nekros.

name: Annoy-o-Troupe
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon three 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Some classes get Void Lords, other classes get Annoyed Lords.

name: Brutal Annihilan
text: Taunt, Rush After this minion survives damage, deal that amount to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Sometimes, problems can be solved by throwing everything you've got at it. This is not one of those times.

name: DJ Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of spells in your hand to (0). After you cast one, the others cost (1) more.
flavorText: Do not sleep on his Tinker Town deep house set - absolutely legendary.

name: Flesh Behemoth
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Draw another Undead and summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Perfect for fleshing out your Undead deck.

name: From De Other Side
text: Summon a copy of each minion in your hand. They attack random enemy minions, then die.
flavorText: Why did Drakuru cross the road?

name: Front Lines
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck. Repeat until either side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: With the line in the sand crossed, the battle for the Throne of Tides had begun.

name: Grand Magister Rommath
text: Battlecry: Recast each spell you've cast this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: A powerful mage known for his proficiencies in Fire, Frost, and Algebra.

name: Imprisoned Horror
text: Costs (1) less for each damage you've taken on your turns this game.
flavorText: Prison changed Jeff.

name: Insatiable Devourer
text: Battlecry: Devour an enemy minion and gain its stats. Infuse ( ): And its neighbors.
flavorText: You're not you when you're anima-starved.

name: Lightray
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Paladin card you've played this game.
flavorText: Lightrays, much like rays of light, tend to be seen closer to the surface.

name: Malygos the Spellweaver
text: Battlecry: Draw spells until your hand is full.
flavorText: After many years, Malygos has decided mortals can use magic. ALL THE MAGIC!

name: Obsidian Statue
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Odyn, Prime Designate
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
flavorText: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavorText: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Overlord Drakuru
text: Rush, Windfury After this attacks and kills a minion, resurrect it on your side.
flavorText: Overlord: (1)

name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
text: Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavorText: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavorText: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Stitched Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Corpse you've spent this game.
flavorText: Sew big or go home!

name: The Scourge
text: Fill your board with random Undead.
flavorText: “You speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave and the true meaning of fear.”

name: The Scourge
text: Fill your board with random Undead.
flavorText: “You speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave and the true meaning of fear.”

name: The Sunwell
text: Fill your hand with random spells. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: The Lich King had extinguished the light of the Sunwell once before - it will take all the might Silvermoon can muster to defend it!

name: Trenchstalker
text: Battlecry: Attack three different random enemies.
flavorText: Cooler heads prevail.

name: Yogg-Saron, Unleashed
text: Titan After this uses an ability, cast two random spells.
flavorText: Has been known to monologue before he strikes.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, get two random Dream cards.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Amplified Elekk
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Before this show can continue, we have to bass-boost the elephant in the room.

name: Banjosaur
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, draw a Beast and gain its stats.
flavorText: You'll all be singing along once he gets to the tyranno-chorus.

name: Climactic Necrotic Explosion
text: Lifesteal. Deal damage. Summon / Souls. (Randomly improved by Corpses you've spent)
flavorText: The less legible the band's logo, the more hardcore it is.

name: Convoke the Spirits
text: Cast 8 random Druid spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: The spirits prefer to convoke when there's some hot gossip to discuss.

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Discard a card for each destroyed.
flavorText: "He’s Deathwing? That one's Deathwing? You're Deathwing!? I'm DEATHWING! ARE THERE ANY OTHER DEATHWINGS I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT?"

name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
text: Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavorText: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

name: Gigantotem
text: Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Totem Golem's uncle, gone too soon.

name: Neptulon the Tidehunter
text: Colossal +2, Rush, Windfury Whenever Neptulon attacks, if you control any Hands, they attack instead.
flavorText: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: See? Giant.

name: Sire Denathrius
text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: Deal 5 damage amongst enemies. Endlessly Infuse ( ): Deal 1 more.
flavorText: History has a way of altering villains so that we can no longer see ourselves in them. Unfortunately for the Venthyr, they all look like Sire Denathrius.

name: Stoneborn General
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Gravewing with Rush.
flavorText: Leads with an iron fist and a stony demeanor.

name: Thaddius, Monstrosity
text: Taunt. Your odd-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!) Taunt. Your even-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!)
flavorText: Feugen is positive that Thaddius will see play, but Stalagg seems negative about it.

name: The Garden's Grace
text: Give a minion +4/+4 and Divine Shield. Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on Holy spells this game.
flavorText: The perfect place to hold Conchella.

name: The Jailer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your deck. This minion gains Immune.
flavorText: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.

name: Chained Guardian
text: Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the enemy deck this game.
flavorText: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.

name: Mountain Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Naga Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells this game.
flavorText: He might be giant, but he’s still a couple thousand protein shakes away from competing in the Colossal Wrestling Championship.

name: Molten Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Health your hero is missing.
flavorText: He gets terrible heartburn. BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Fanottem, Lord of the Opera
text: Taunt, Lifesteal This card's Cost is equal to the amount of cards in your deck.
flavorText: Writing a compelling symphony takes time. Usually around 20 turns or more.
